value.title: In Battle With Microsoft, Google Bets on Medical AI Program to Crack Healthcare Industry
value.excerpt: Google’s rivals have moved quickly to incorporate AI advances into patient interactions. Microsoft, the largest investor in OpenAI and its closest business partner, in April teamed up with the health software company Epic to build tools that can automatically draft messages to patients using the algorithms behind ChatGPT.

value.title: TCS to train 25K staff on Azure, OpenAI Gen AI tools
value.excerpt: TCS also launched a generative AI business offering, called TCS Generative AI Enterprise Adoption, which will offer deployments of OpenAI’s generative AI business tools via the Azure platform to businesses.

value.title: US looks to cut China cloud access to AWS, Azure and more
value.excerpt: The US and China have imposed various sanctions and rules to limit the supply of computing elements in an effort to prevent the other from getting access to potentially more powerful capabilities.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence can shorten cancer radiation treatment duration
value.excerpt: Predictive AI models can assess a person's likelihood of developing cancer by identifying risk factors. A new AI tool shortens cancer patients' waiting time for treatment.

value.title: ChatGPT Vs. Microsoft, Runway's Funding, and Tesla's Predictions: AI Developments This Week
value.excerpt: Nikola Tesla Predicted The Rise AI Over 100 Years Ago With Scary Accuracy. A reexamination of Nikola Tesla’s writings revealed his prescient envisioning of AI. He predicted the emergence of autonomous machines capable of learning and adjusting their actions based on external influences. Read the full article here.

value.title: Microsoft, TikTok give generative AI a sort of memory
value.excerpt: The programs use databases to beat ChatGPT at hundreds of turns of dialogue. The innovations can give any large language model ChatGPT-like abilities.
